title: "Researchers propose ‘ethically correct AI’ for smart guns that locks out mass shooters"
excerpt: "A trio of computer scientists from the Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute in New York recently published research detailing a potential AI intervention for murder: an ethical lockout. The big idea here is to stop mass shootings and other ethically incorrect uses for firearms through the development of an AI that can recognize intent,"
